animeTitle: Ippun de Wakaru Eiga "Donten ni Warau" Kaisetsu Yokoku
animeDescription: A special collaboration with Eagle Talon and Donten ni Warau. The latter is having a live-action movie release on March 21, 2018. In the special, the Chancellor and Yoshida introduce the movie and make comments on the story.
animeRelated: ['Other: Donten ni Warau', 'Alternative version: Donten ni Warau x Mameshiba']
